paper_abstract: The Parque Estadual do Cantao is located at Tocantins (TO), north of Brazil, in a delta formed by the rivers Javaes, Coco and Araguaia. It is a wetland where the seasonal changes drive the biogeochemistry cycles. The knowledge of the water flux dynamics is very important for the understanding of these cycles. This work uses a methodology to model and simulate the velocity field based on Navier-Stokes equations. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Modelling and numerical simulation of the velocity field in the Parque Estadual do Cantao (TO), Brazil
